description: Try our easy to follow Bean Burgers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Bean Burgers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 salted anchovies in olive oil, drained

recipeInstructions.text: Put the drained beans and chickpeas in a food processor, and pulse several times until the beans are broken up.

Add the onion, anchovies, and mustard, and season well with salt and black pepper. Pulse again a few times. You want the mixture to be well combined, but not sloppy. Now add the eggs, and pulse again until combined. Add the flour (just enough to bind the burgers), and pulse until incorporated.

Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large non-stick frying pan over a medium heat. Once the oil is hot, spoon out a portion of the bean mixture (it makes 6 burgers) and, using lots of flour on your hands, form into a flattened burger before adding to the pan. Fry undisturbed for 2-3 minutes on each side until firm and golden. Cook in batches of 2 or 3 burgers at a time, forming the burgers as you go and adding more oil when needed. Serve hot, sandwiched in a bun with crisp lettuce and tomato ketchup.
